TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OutputCacheProfile extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class OutputCacheProfile Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 配置可由应用程序页使用的输出缓存配置文件。

span.span: Configures the output cache profile that can be used by the application pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一种以编程方式访问和修改 `add` `outputCacheProfiles` 配置文件的节中的部分元素的方法 `caching` 。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `add` element of the `outputCacheProfiles` section in the `caching` section of a configuration file. 对象集中经常使用的配置设置（例如依赖项、缓存位置和缓存过期时间），无需在每个页面上指定它们。The object centralizes frequently used configuration settings such as dependencies, cache location, and cache expiration time, eliminating the need to specify them on every page. 可以使用指令的特性将应用于页 `CacheProfile` 。The can be applied to a page using the `CacheProfile` attribute of the directive. > [!NOTE] > 指令可以重写对象所包含的所有设置 （属性除外） 。The directive can override all the settings contained by an object except for the attribute. 这是为了启用或禁用， 而不需要修改可能已覆盖的所有页中的指令。This is to enable or disable the without having to modify the directives in all the pages that might have overridden it. 类监视依赖关系，以便在任何缓存项发生更改时，将自动删除缓存项。The class monitors the dependencies so that when any cached item changes, the cached item will be automatically removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 集合来访问其 对象。The following code example shows how to use the collection to access its objects. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Duration { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Duration : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置缓存页或缓存控件过程的持续时间。

span.span: Gets or sets the time duration during which the page or control is cached.

value.span: 以秒为单位的持续时间。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示缓存页或用户控件的时间（以秒为单位）。The represents the time in seconds that the page or user control is cached. 设置此属性将为 HTTP 响应从应用到的页面或控件建立过期策略，并将自动导致缓存其输出。Setting this property establishes an expiration policy for HTTP responses from the page or control to which it applies and will automatically cause the caching of their output. > [!NOTE] > 必须使用配置文件在页的配置文件或指令中进行定义。The must be defined in either the profile or the directive of a page using the profile. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether caching is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性仅允许在一个位置启用或禁用缓存机制。The property allows enabling or disabling the caching mechanism in one place only. 它会影响使用此的所有页面或控件 。It affects all the pages or controls that use this . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#12)]

member this.Location : System.Web.UI.OutputCacheLocation with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置输出缓存位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the output cache location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置为 `Any` ，则输出缓存可位于发出请求的浏览器客户端、代理服务器或参与请求的任何其他服务器上，或者位于处理请求的服务器上。If is set to `Any`, the output cache can be located on the browser client, where the request originated; on a proxy server, or any other server, participating in the request; or on the server where the request was processed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#5)]

member this.Name : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks `CacheProfile` 如果要将值应用于 页或控件，请使用将值分配给指令的特性。You use the to assign a value to the `CacheProfile` attribute of the directive if you want to apply the values to a page or control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#11)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用辅助存储。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether secondary storage is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用次要存储，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if secondary storage is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将属性设置为发出响应的页面，该 `true` 响应在其标头中指定以防止敏感信息的辅助存储。The page that has the property set to `true` issues a response specifying in its header to prevent secondary storage of sensitive information. 将此特性设置为 `true` 等效于在 Web 请求过程中调用方法。Setting this attribute to `true` is equivalent to invoking the method during a Web request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SqlDependency { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SqlDependency : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义 Web 应用程序和 SQL Server 的实例之间的关系，允许检测服务器上数据的更改。The defines a relationship between a Web application and an instance of SQL Server, allowing the detection of changes in the data at the server. 确保每次从缓存中删除输出缓存的页时，它们所依赖的 SQL 表都已更改。The ensures that output cached pages are removed from the cache whenever the SQL table on which they depend changes. > [!NOTE] > 类监视表，以便在表发生更改时，将自动从缓存中删除该项。The class monitors the table so that when the table changes, the item will be automatically removed from the Cache. 此类不能被继承。This class cannot be inherited. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByContentEncoding { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByContentEncoding : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置要缓存的一组内容编码（以分号分隔）。

span.span: Gets or sets the semicolon-delimited set of content encodings to be cached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些 设置与指令的属性使用的设置相同 `VaryByContentEncoding` 。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByContentEncoding` attribute of the directive. .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByControl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByControl : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是要缓存的控件的 id 的分号分隔集。The is a semicolon-delimited set of IDs of controls to be cached. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缓存用户控件输出的多个版本](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad)。For more information, see [Caching Multiple Versions of User Control Output](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad). > [!NOTE] > 这些 设置与指令的属性使用的设置相同 `VaryByControls` 。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByControls` attribute of the directive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByCustom { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByCustom : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是表示自定义输出缓存要求的任何文本。The can be any text that represents custom output-caching requirements. 如果输入了自定义字符串，则必须重写 应用程序的 global.asax 文件中的方法。If a custom string is entered, you must override the method in the application's Global.asax file. > [!NOTE] > 这些 设置与指令的属性使用的设置相同 `VaryByCustom` 。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByCustom` attribute of the directive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByHeader { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByHeader : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一组用分号分隔的标头，用于改变缓存的输出。The is a semicolon-delimited set of headers used to vary the cached output. 这些是与请求关联的 HTTP 标头。These are HTTP headers associated with the request. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缓存页面的多个版本](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xadzbzd6(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Caching Multiple Versions of a Page](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xadzbzd6(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 这些 设置与 `VaryByHeader` [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100))的属性使用的设置相同。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByHeader` attribute of the [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)). 不建议通过设置 "" 的值来区分所有标头 \* 。Varying by all headers by setting the value of "\*" is not recommended. 这可能会导致在 Web 服务器上发生缓存溢出或拒绝服务攻击。It can result in cache overflow or a denial of service attack on the Web server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#2)]

span.span: Caching Multiple Versions of a Page

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ VaryByParam { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.VaryByParam : string with get, set

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一组用分号分隔的参数，用于改变缓存的输出。The is a semicolon-delimited set of parameters used to vary the cached output. 它允许通过 GET 查询字符串或窗体 POST 参数改变缓存的输出。It allows varying the cached output by GET query string or form POST parameters. 例如，通过指定用户控件名称以及查询字符串或窗体 POST 参数，可以将用户控件输出与缓存发生变化。For instance, you can vary the user-control output to the cache by specifying the user-control name along with either a query string or a form POST parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缓存用户控件输出的多个版本](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad)。For more information, see [Caching Multiple Versions of User Control Output](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7f7d839a-c060-4d2a-9c4e-7fd1080ec0ad). 此 设置必须在配置文件或使用配置文件的页面的指令中进行定义。The setting must be defined in either the profile or the directive of the page using the profile. > [!NOTE] > 这些 设置与 `VaryByParam` [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100))的属性使用的设置相同。The settings are the same ones used by the `VaryByParam` attribute of the [@ OutputCache](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/hdxfb6cy(v=vs.100)). 不建议通过设置 "" 的值来区分所有参数 \* 。Varying by all parameters by setting the value of "\*" is not recommended. 这可能会导致在 Web 服务器上发生缓存溢出或拒绝服务攻击。It can result in cache overflow or a denial of service attack on the Web server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/CS/OutputCacheProfile.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile/VB/OutputCacheProfile.vb#8)]
